content: नर्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> [नृभ्यो हितं यत्] {@--1@} Suitable to men (as food &c.). {@--2@} Manly, strong. {@--3@} Human. --र्यः {@--1@} A man. {@--2@} Indra. --र्यौ (<ab>du.</ab>) The two objects of human desire, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} Heaven and earth. --र्यं {@--1@} A manly deed. {@--2@} A gift for men.
